pr_title: [FLINK-17646][python] Reduce the package size of PyFlink.

timeline.message: [FLINK-17646][python] Reduce the python package size of PyFlink.
fix the build error on windows

timeline.bodyText: there should be two empty lines.
timeline.author: dianfu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -41,6 +43,15 @@ def remove_if_exists(file_path):
             rmtree(file_path)
 
 
+def find_file_path(pattern):
+    files = glob.glob(pattern)
+    if len(files) < 1:
+        print("Failed to find the file %s." % pattern)
+        exit(-1)
+    if len(files) > 1:
+        print("The file pattern %s is ambiguous: %s" % (pattern, files))
+    return files[0]
+

timeline.bodyText: I think we should also exit(-1) in this case
timeline.author: dianfu
timeline.diffHunk:
